instance_type.description: The type of instance used for the provisioned workers.

instance_count.description: The number of worker nodes in your cluster. (Minimum: 3, Maximum 50)

location.description: The GCP region where the cluster is placed, including the zone.

disk_size_gb.description: The worker node storage capacity. (Minimum:80, Maximum: 65536)

cluster_labels.description: Tags to be applied to resources in your cluster. (Optional)

dns_credentials_json.description: Contents of a service account key file in JSON format, with rights to edit DNS.
